website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quality concerns, this canister model offers some of Hoover's best features for a price that's significantly lower than similar models by some competing brands.
pros: Features the brand's WindTunnel technology in a bagless model with a dirt cup that is easy to empty and clean
Cord recoils back into the unit for easy storage
cons: Suction power tends to diminish over time
Vacuum head and tubing are prone to clogging with debris

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one based on the good reviews. We use it at our vet hospital ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hoover Wind Tunnel. I bought this one based on the good reviews. We use it at our vet hospital for a few of the large rugs. It works extremely well. It is self propelled. My older model is not. The canister is easy to dump. This design is great because the dirt and dog hair does not wrap around the filter as it does in my older model. I may end up buying another one for my house. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing good to say about this product! Total waste of money. The so called wind tunnel is a complete joke! Animal hair gets trapped in the tunnel & requires you to constantly empty the canister. The process of emptying the canister makes a horrible mess!!! And even when you constantly empty the canister &/clean the filter the dang thing overheats & shuts off! Cant even begin to tell you how much I hate this vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.author: DLefaivre

customer_reviews.title: Worthless garbage Run Away!!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, only worked for 10 minutes before there was a flash in the power head because the motor short-circuited. Pulled it apart to make sure there was nothing in the belt or belt came off. Nope DOA! In total IT WORKED FOR 10 MINUTES Took 2 weeks to get here and now 1 week to get a replacement. Update. New one vacuumed the house once. 2nd time worked for 20 minutes then the head motor died again. Pulled it apart. Head was spotless belt was intact. I think they are getting the cheapest motor they can get for the head.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pheil

customer_reviews.title: This was an Amazon scratch & dent. NO scratch the elec. brush did not work. :(
customer_reviews.text: So it works fine for the hardwork floor with the sweep tool. The carpet attachment head does not spin. :( This product (per Hoover) is no longer made, no canister unit is with them. They went to the stick (more weight to carry). Hoover is sending me a new brush head.
customer_reviews.author: Cavalry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what elitist vacuums others have had, but this is a great vacuum!!! My previous residence had a central vacuum and it was great for hardwood floors - I was looking for a vacuum similar to that with the brush attachment. I also have never had a canister vacuum which I really like. Great suction, not too heavy to transport, great for hard floors and carpets with the attachments that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: Workable Solution for the Dry Dusty Climate
customer_reviews.text: Powerful suction, ease of use and maneuvering, cord retract and length is ideal, light to carry, tight canister - no leaking, and I could go on and on about the benefits of this inexpensive vacuum; certainly compared to the higher end model. The bottom line is that you want to suction up dirt and dust and I buying a $500 vacuum just appear pointless unless you have disposable cash. This vac does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LJABQ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: We used it twice, nothing heavy at all. short carpet. Second time it turned off and almost caught on fire. We just made the 30 day return, it's going back!
customer_reviews.author: IGEMZ

customer_reviews.title: It has great suction/ but short cord.
customer_reviews.text: The suction is get for the pet hair & dirt. It is light weight but does a good job. The cord is short which is a pain in a open floor plan. I personally wish power switch was on the handle not the vacume unit itself as have to walk back to it to turn it on or off. I was not expensive & will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: cyd edgerley

customer_reviews.title: I had another one that I purchased from a local ...
customer_reviews.text: I had another one that I purchased from a local chain store. It did the job and the price was reasonable. This one although the same make and model, is slightly lower in quality; the top of the filter come off with a nudge and it is hard to put it back on. The cable retract-er is somewhat weak too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with rugs, stairs and/or animals
customer_reviews.text: This little guy gets it done! Pro's: - Lightweight and compact - Powerful - no adjustments needed for different rug depths or bare floor - Picks up cat hair with ease Con's: - Small size means many trips to the garbage - Cord is quite short - The main unit gets hung up on door jams pretty easy, and can actually flip over pretty easy as well. You have to vacuum like you're pulling a trailer :) - Animal hair can get into the second screen and block off flow. Be sure you're checking the red screen often
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Conley

customer_reviews.title: For light duty
customer_reviews.text: We have mostly wood floors so I thought I could get by with this, but it clogs way too easy at multiple points in the hose and filter system, has a small dirt capacity, overheats and shuts down for long periods of time and the rug beater attachment abruptly stopped working one day when all I used it for was area rugs. I gave up on it when it started smelling like the electrical system was burning up. We live in the country with a lot of sand, kids, pets and wood stove debris and it just couldn't hack it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, low quality.
customer_reviews.text: The wheels stopped rotating after the first week of use in a studio apartment. Should have been a return at that point, but the vacuum still works, I just pull it around on its side (actually much easier to move that way due to the poor design). Rotating brush works well, but the fact that the canister portion is hard to drag behind you without working wheels makes it a pain to use. The latch on the canister empty mechanism just broke today - it lasted until the day after the warranty expired, but should have been returned long ago. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Tyler Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Like almost at every use
customer_reviews.text: have been using for several months. filters require very regular cleaning - performance is greatly diminished. Like almost at every use. cannister unit's wheels often get stuck on door frames and corners, or sometimes it simply tips over backward instead of swiveling around . cord is very short - I bought a extension cord so I could just plug it in in one spot and do the whole house. Doesn't deal well with something like confetti (I have a toddler who likes to cut paper into small pieces) - will get clogged. I honestly don't know what the advantage is versus an upright. No better, no worse.
customer_reviews.author: J. Midwest

customer_reviews.title: Works great on Hardwood or Carpet
customer_reviews.text: After having a few other canister vacs that were not light weight I wanted one light weight and easy to move around. I also wanted one that works well on carpet, tile and hardwood. This vacuum is great, it has lots of suction power, I mean it will easily lift up area rugs. It maneuver easily between table legs and furniture and it was a pleasure to use on both carpet, tile and hard wood floors. The only con would be when you extend it while vacuuming, it actually lifts up off the carpet slightly which reduces suction. This just seems like a design flaw. Other than that I think it's an all around great performer. Andre
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Dave Electronics does not stand behind the products they sell.
customer_reviews.text: Dave Electronics is selling defective merchandise and will not honor Warrantee on products they sell. Hoover claims that Dave Electronics is not an authorized seller of Hoover products so they will not honor the Warrantee either. I now have a six month old vacuum that has a 36 month Warrantee with no one taking responsibility for fixing or replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Burr

customer_reviews.title: they only good thing I have to say is it is lightweight ...
customer_reviews.text: definitely cannot be compared to dyson. I cleaned my rugs with this then with my dyson and it picked up allot of dirt the hoover missed. they only good thing I have to say is it is lightweight and for hardwood floors it does a good job. Otherwise buy the dyson if you can it's a much better product. I guess you get what you pay for. cord is very short requires an extension cord to use and the hose is flimsy
customer_reviews.author: mickel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is annoying me . The clip that holds the dirt canister on the vacuum broke a long time ago so the dirt canister basically just sits on the vacuum without being attached. That’s really fun when you’re trying to carry it up and down the stairs. Also , the part of the vacuum head that connects to the pole has come apart , so when I’m vacuuming,the vacuum head disconnects itself and is only holding on by wires when I push the vacuum back and forth . This thing is not worth the money . Now I have to be bothered trying to get it repaired when really I want to throw it in the dumpster
customer_reviews.author: Vallie smart

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is cheap and poorly made. I had the old wind tunnel and loved it but this one doesn't even compare. All materials are made of cheap flimsy plastic, the hose has no give, the carpet attachment isn't sturdy enough to vacuum my rug without flipping over. Please don't waste your money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum we have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum we have ever owned, does the job as well as the expensive ones. Will stop working if the filter gets clogged, but will start up again once it cools. We keep a clean house but it continues to suck up an amazing amount of dirt and fine dust each time we use it, we have had it well over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning the dust out the various compartments is not as easy as one might want and some parts are inaccessible ...
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works well and cleans much more thoroughly than I would have expected for a canister model. It does however have a very strong plastic smell when it is running even after more than a month of use. Cleaning the dust out the various compartments is not as easy as one might want and some parts are inaccessible so the dirt remains visible. Purchased in November and died without warning in June! Not a reliable device and would not recommend Hoover products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction but hard to move around
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for the price. It has really strong suction; sometimes too strong even on the low setting. I didn't give it 5 stars for two reasons. First, it is hard to drag the canister part of the vacuum. When I pull on the hose, the canister tends to tilt up and then it won't roll easily. The wheels don't glide very smoothly. Second, the cord is pretty short and I need to continuously plug it in a new outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Groff

customer_reviews.title: I HATE it. After 35 years using Hoovers
customer_reviews.text: This is awkward, difficult to steer, the cord is way too short to do even one room without changing the plug from wall to wall. It has very low power, and I wish I could return it. I HATE it. After 35 years using Hoovers, I will find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first 4 months. Then it lost suction and lately will only run for 10 minutes before overheating and shutting down. This is the second vacuum I've gone through recently (other was a different brand). I guess they don't make them like they used to. Years ago I had a Sears with metal parts that lasted me 15 yrs!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this vacuum for a few months now. Love the power and ease of it. It really has a lot of suction! I have 4 indoor dogs and 4 indoor cats so needless to say I use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I bought this vaccum about an year and a half ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vaccum about an year and a half ago. The carpet cleaning head broke after 3 months. And it now overheats after 15 minutes and shuts down. I need to buy another vaccum and will certainly go with another model of another brand.
customer_reviews.author: martyd

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum. No overheating here.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this vacuum now for 2 years. I figured out the overheating problem. You need to thoroughly clean the dirt chamber. The inner piece twists out and check for strings around the RED screen. Keep it clean and it will not overheat. Also clean your filters - EVERY TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chimahusky

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of moderate use the canister attachment broke and no longer secures to the unit. Since the handle to carry the vacuum is part of the canister, you cannot carry it up and down stairs. Of course the window to return this unit expired and Amazon won't take it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Menich

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We used it for a few months and it just overheated and is now not working . I really expected a vacuum to last more than 3 months. I read the reviews about overheating but I thought it might be misuse. I used it exactly as directed- just a crappy product.
customer_reviews.author: Eli rothenberg

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it did work well, until today. It isn't even 6 months old and it has stopped working. The motor just quit running. They say I cannot return it now... and I have been unsuccessful in contacting, Amazon, LLC, which I purchased it from to get any answers!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: great little vacuum has great power i am selling my ...
customer_reviews.text: great little vacuum has great power i am selling my Dyson this unit does an even better job, and for the money i do not think you need more it cleaned my rugs great and i couldn't believe the ball of stuff in the vacuum when i was done nice get this unit
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: but I'm not amazed. I had a really hard time closing the ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems decent so far, but I'm not amazed. I had a really hard time closing the canister after inserting the filter- I'm worried about opening it again to clean the filter because who knows if I can get it closed again. Also, oddly enough I think mine came with an attachment that belongs to a different vacuum because it doesn't fit this vacuum and it isn't listed in the manual as one of the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 23 moths of rare usage.
customer_reviews.text: It was a good and easy to use vacuum cleaner. But after 23 months of rare usage, today, its sound started to change and then burning smell went out. It is dead now. And seems like Amazon has just 2 months of return policy for this item. I don't have any warranty or repair option. Very sad...
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: I am very very upset with this vacuum cleaner. ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very very upset with this vacuum cleaner. It stopped picking up for no reason. I am now stuck with a broken vacuum cleaner after 3 months. Amazon is unable to return it. I will never buy a Hoover again.I WISH I COULD RETURN IT.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Yochim

customer_reviews.title: Could be ok for a very small home.
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed with this vacuum. After 6 months it over heats and turns off. It's such a hassle to wait for it to cool down to finish vacuuming. I have kept the filters clean.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Pros: relatively quiet, retractable cord, very effective cleaning, easy to empty, easy for kids to operate Cons: awkward shape for storing in closet, no storage for attachments Takes out tons of dirt my old vacuum failed to remove. Sturdy and compact. Odd shape is not extremely convenient for storage, but can deal with that because it's a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J Randall

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened to others :/
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for 6 months..... Then just like others it overheated and the motor burned up. I'm going to try and get a warranty repair but it sounds like these things are prone to this. My advice is steer clear...read the reviews and choose wiser than I did
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Within 10 min of first use, vacuum head sparked and stopped working. Ordered a new one, second day of use the main part overheated and wouldn't work again til 45 min later.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and great suction. My Place is hardwood and carpet. About 1200 sq feet. I vacuum the whole house and had no problems with overheating as I saw in some reviews. Overall a good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: A very good vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a little wonder-machine. It's easily toteable up & down stairs (I have 3 levels). The suction is very good. I have only hardwood floors so I can't review its carpet cleaning effectiveness. Sometimes the chamber inside the dust bin gets clogged with hair but it's no big deal to get it unclogged.
customer_reviews.author: Maura McKnight

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. After a month, I like the adjustable length wand, which helps with the ceiling. The head lays flat to go under the bed. The dust canister is easy to empty. The beater head works well. The hose is long enough to move about easily, but not too long as to get tangled around the furniture. I have not yet needed to clean the HEPA filter, so i guess most of the fine dust is being captured before it reaches that filter. The "3-in-1" upholstery brush is poorly designed. It's not going last. I anticipate needing to replace it with a sensible set of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Steven King

customer_reviews.title: We had a Hoover prior to this purchase, where ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a Hoover prior to this purchase, where the switch in the handle went out and unfortunately you have to replace the whole wand assy, which cost almost as much as we paid for this vacuum. Still the versatility of the unit and the extra settings and seems to be more power persuaded us to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DgLakewood Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Don't wast your money.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap junk. Used it three times and then the hinge broke off from the bottom of the canister. Tried glue and duct tape to repair, but it wouldn't hold the seal. The whole thing went in the trash and I bought a quality vacuum from Grainger.
customer_reviews.author: D Will

customer_reviews.title: Nice vac with lots of power
customer_reviews.text: wow a lot of suction and I must say it gets my area rug very clean. Only problem is its not self propelled and its hard to get it not to suck your rug off the floor. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: I've had this less than a week and yesterday I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this less than a week and yesterday I was sweeping for about 1/2 hour and it over heated and quit running. After an hour I was able to start again. It only took about 15 minutes to over heat again. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: John Tester

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum does a good job and has plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum does a good job and has plenty of power. The drawbacks would have to be the cord length and the hose length. They really limit you on how much area you can work in without having to tug the canister around. Otherwise I would have used it more. I'm going to be looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. TMac

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was great, the product, not so much
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum on 12/11/14. It worked perfectly. I used it once or twice a week since then. Have carpets and hard wood. Worked great on both. Today it stopped working. It was running very hot after 5 minutes of use and just stopped. Although the product died in less than 3 weeks, Amazon still allowed me to return it even without the box that got tossed with the Christmas stuff. Bad item, but Amazon was amazing, quickly responded and accepted the return
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for picking up hair.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to store with limited space. Doesn't hose doesn't stand alone.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: it vacuums like a champ and maneuvers super well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an alternative to the built-in vacuum in our 5th wheel unit; HOLY COW!! This thing ROCKS! It's small enough to fit under the bed in the storage, it vacuums like a champ and maneuvers super well! I couldn't believe the dirt it pulled out of the carpet. LOVE THIS! Highly recommend if you're in the market for a compact, bag-less, super suck vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum. It is easy to maneuver and empty.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice vacuum. I used to clean houses professionally so I know what I like in a easy to use but super powerful cleaner. This is it. Small, powerful, inexpensive (I would consider buying another one just to store way for the future). What I really like is the smaller head power nozzle. Gets into small spaces easier than wider ones, and the smaller head concentrates suction for a better clean. The bagless system is good, it does kick up some dust when you empty it, so you do have to be mindful of how you are dumping and where if that is a concern. The container is easy to rinse out as well if that too is a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Carl D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I saw this at Target. Looked good but kind of pricey. So when I got home we checked Amazon and low and behold there it was and it was about $40.00 less expensive. This little guy is light yet has the power to do the big jobs.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: THIS HOOVER FAILED ON ALL COUNTS
customer_reviews.text: I HATE THIS VACUUM. ALWAYS GETS CLOGGED. THE ALL IN ONE TOOL IS AWFUL. I WANTED TO REPLACE MY WIND TUNNEL....Bagless. But did not see online...no idea the item would be soooooo useless. I would gladly trade for the earlier grey bagless EVEN IF RECONDITIONED!
customer_reviews.author: Virtual Garages

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Its a good vacuum cl. But ıts too heavy for me so I m very hardly..
customer_reviews.author: Buses

customer_reviews.title: Veyr powerful, very small, less than half the ...
customer_reviews.text: Veyr powerful, very small, less than half the weight of the previous Hoover canister vac that this replaced. It is so powerful that on rugs you need to open up the suction valve a bit to reduce the grip on the rug a bit.
customer_reviews.author: AlexB

customer_reviews.title: Product SUCKS...or at least it used to until it DIED!
customer_reviews.text: Always overheated even if canister and inner parts emptied and cleaned often. After a year it just stopped running. Very upsetting as I don't have extra money to spend on yet another vacuum right before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Robbins

customer_reviews.title: It's a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Had to change my rating. I was using this for the fourth time and the telescoping wand ceased to hold it's position. I'm contacting Hoover to see what can be done about this. Very disappointed as I really liked it up to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Mabe

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable work
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum cleaner is easy to work, power is good, sometime the suction tube is not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: J.Gosia Maciejowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love the vacuum, the motorized brushes, and the bare floor tool. The "3 in 1" tool is a joke. Go buy some universal dusting brush, crevice tool, upholstery cleaner instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Made a lot cheaper than the one I bought just like it 10 years ago, but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dundee

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard wood floors
customer_reviews.text: The power head is not that good, it has great suction and works nicely but not good for thick carpets. I would recommend for anyone with a camper or allot of hardwood floors
customer_reviews.author: DWH

customer_reviews.title: This one is not as good as the Dyson one I had
customer_reviews.text: It does the job! This one is not as good as the Dyson one I had, but it is powerful for my thick carpet. i don't like the dirt collecting area, dust gets stuck when it's halfway full, so i have to empty out more often then desired.
customer_reviews.author: Lusine Harutyunyan

customer_reviews.title: easy to store
customer_reviews.text: pro : light ,small ,easy to store ,easy to dump canister , has lots of suction to cleans hard floors and carpets . We love it . cons : No height adjustment on power nozzle even with suction adjustment on low it sticks on some low pile carpets .
customer_reviews.author: waldon bailey

customer_reviews.title: looks good and cleans good...
customer_reviews.text: cleans really well, easy to empty out and clean and somewhat easy to store... I don't like the fact you can't regulate the hight of the brush and also the fact that the brush can get stuck sometimes if you clean deep under the bed of couch... would recommend it.. Replaced my Oreck canister (bagged) for this and even though the Oreck was awesome, this is bagless and much lighter..would recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: Bruno M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Couldn't find a canister vacuum anywhere. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Wish the floor piece was a little nicer quality but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... does not have the part anymore buiit I still like it
customer_reviews.text: Had to give this three stairs because my handle started to pill off and hover does not have the part anymore buiit I still like it
customer_reviews.author: mike  buero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is light weight and the suction power is great.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wast your time
customer_reviews.text: I have pets and you can forget it. It went in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: TNelson

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper....
customer_reviews.text: Cord is short. Does not roll well. Heavy for a little thing. You need to empty it often or it will overheat. It does have fantastic suction. Would I buy it again, NO! Hinge broke off yesterday when I was emptying it. Now I will see how far I get with warranty. Beware if AMAZON suggests to by belts or filters with it, may not be the correct ones for this vac.
customer_reviews.author: karen freeland

customer_reviews.title: To bad I am not able to give none of the ...
customer_reviews.text: To bad I am not able to give none of the stars. Worse vacuum ever. Stopped working after 6 months, customer service is not answering the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ewa

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum...the fact that you can empty it and keep it clean and it doesn't smell up the room...I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary  Belle Snow

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality hose assembly
customer_reviews.text: It works well until the hose breaks. This is the second one of these I've had and the hose broke both times after less than 2 years of light use. The replacement hose assembly costs nearly as much as a new vacuum. Will not purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Machelle

customer_reviews.title: This vac
customer_reviews.text: It is a good vac with lots of power! The only issue I have is with how easy and quickly it loses power so you have to make sure to clean the filters out quite frequently! Besides that, and overlooking the short cord, it is a good lightweight vac!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: It is not as good as the old model Hoover WindTunnel Bagless Canister vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It is not as good as the old model Hoover WindTunnel Bagless Canister vacuum. The new one is lighter but it is made very cheap. The canister fill up to fast and is not easy to clean. Also if it is not cleaned real good it dose no pick up as well. The cheap made sofa and furniture dust brush is a pain use (all in one tool). Have to use a tool from another vacuum. I now use my old Tri Star with the costly bags. Please bring back the old model!
customer_reviews.author: Baroness von Behr

customer_reviews.title: Weight
customer_reviews.text: Cleans we'll. However this vacuum is very heavy. I can barely push it.
customer_reviews.author: GRANDCABARE.T

customer_reviews.title: Overheats all the time
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use in a small restaurant with some carpet, cannot vacuum the entire restaurant without this overheating.. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Smurfy

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my hardwood floors and carpeting
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is phenomenal. Works great on my hardwood floors and carpeting. If you have pets, this is a great vacuum. Suction on it is great...it cleans up all dog hair. I have a German Shepherd who sheds a lot so it was important to get a vacuum that works great and this one does!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just say no.
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times and then the motor burned up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to remove attachments and gets stopped up easily. Not much power
customer_reviews.text: Would not repurchase. Very hard to remove attachments and gets stopped up easily. Not much power.
customer_reviews.author: chiapet

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good little vacuum but the core is a little to short.
customer_reviews.author: laura stassi-castillo

customer_reviews.title: The suction pick up on carpet is great. And I love the attachment for the hard ...
customer_reviews.text: The wind tunnel air bag less has really met expectations. The suction pick up on carpet is great. And I love the attachment for the hard wood floors. The bristles are soft and don't scratch my hardwood floors and this attachment has really good suction as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: It was great for a while...
customer_reviews.text: I got this in mid March it hasn't worked properly since mid November. You would expect a vacuum cleaner that costs over a $100 to last at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rego

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stay Away from this unit and all other Garbage HOOVER Products...
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Really good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great! I have animals and this picks up all the hair. It is small and not heavy and makes cleaning a lot easier. I haven't had issues with clogging and make sure to clean out the plastic bin after every use to make hair doesn't build up. The unit does get warm but no more than any other vacuum I've had. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic! It picks up dirt that others left behind
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic! It picks up dirt that others left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Macauley

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at the power the machine
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I am very careful about cleaning the filters. Amazed at the power the machine had
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.

customer_reviews.title: Motor Failed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. The motor failed after about 4 uses. Overheats immediately.
customer_reviews.author: N. Giuliano

customer_reviews.title: So far its holding its own against the pet fur ...
customer_reviews.text: So far its holding its own against the pet fur and dirt in our mountain home. Works well to get under the couch and chairs. Not as maneuverable as an upright, but once you get used to pulling the canister along its manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the vacuum but my cleaning lady likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Maneuvers well and is easy to use. But the suction power isn't very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure if I would like this one as well as the 40060 my granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I would like this one as well as the 40060 my granddaughter had, but have found this one to be almost as good. It is different in some ways and a little heavy , but so far I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Marietta Boley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We used this item a few times then it shorted out.
customer_reviews.author: harmonyhouse4lunch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed with vacuum powernozzle always clogs up and the vacuum over heats and shutsoff all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Suction power doesn't disappoint. Barely spew dust back in the air, it contain it. I haven't realize how dirty my apartment is.
customer_reviews.author: m panes

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum was perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was perfect for my needs. It is light to move around. It does fine on the few carpets that I have and great on my wooden floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good vacuum cleaner! Easy to work with,not heavy like others
customer_reviews.author: Vlada

customer_reviews.title: Worth the trouble?  Maybe...
customer_reviews.text: Once it's up and running, the performance is great. Easy to use, good suction, easy to maneuver. My main problem is all the attention it needs once the vacuuming is done. I'm used to an Oreck upright... use it over and over and just wrap the cord and put it away. This bagless WindTunnel needs cleaning after each round of the house. Cannister needs dumping, filter need cleaning, and the brush that works well getting the cat hair out of the carpet needs cleaning also. That must be the trade-off for having a bagless vacuum cleaner. If I were to rate it against other cannisters, I may have scored it higher. P.S. The cord is too short.
customer_reviews.author: P. Paula E.

customer_reviews.title: Burned up on sixth use. Cheap Cheap Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Six uses and it's laying there dead with a pillow of smoke coming from the motor. This machine is as cheaply and poorly made as it can be. It It runs real hot with a grossly under powered motor and the beater brush is equally poor. At $10.00 this machine would be a rip off. More importantly, is a fire hazard that puts people at risk. Save your money for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brownm279

customer_reviews.title: the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it...so far so good. I have it for only two days now but i vacuum everything i could already...i really dont get it the bad reviews about it. Its really great vacuum, works on carpet,hardwood,tiles etc...it really does. Im glad bought it because it works great and if anythink it has 3 years warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Tons of dog hair
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum!!' Absolutely LOVE it.. We have double digit dogs.. This little guy is perfect for all the dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: julie jeffery

product_meta.title: Hoover Vacuum Cleaner WindTunnel Air Bagless Corded Canister Vacuum SH40070
product_meta.description:
Style:AirThe Hoover Air Canister Vacuum will make you believe performance comes in all sizes. Powered by WindTunnel 3 Technology, the Air canister is lightweight, steerable and versatile for all your multi-floor surfaces. And the tool attachments and multi floor power nozzle give you freedom and cleaning access a most traditional upright vacuum just can’t reach.HEPA Media Filter filter made with HEPA media traps 99.97% of dust, dirt and pollens down to 0.3 microns.

NOTE

The common issue with a product overheating is that the customer are using it in a heavy dirt environment and the filter is clogging and needs cleaned or replaced.
feature_bullets: WindTunnel 3 Technology : creates three channels of suction to lift and remove surface debris and deep down embedded dirt
Multi Cyclonic : air passes through not one, but two cyclonic stages to filter dirt and debris from the air path for no loss of suction
Steerable Technology : navigate smoothly around furniture, corners and other obstacles by simply twisting the handle in the direction you'd like to go
Includes a Telescoping Extension Wand, 3 in 1 Tool and Hard Floor Brush

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars755 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
